pr_title: Add support for MCC/MNC and Country fields in CCT Transport Backend.

timeline.message: Add support for MCC/MNC and Country fields in CCT Transport Backend.

timeline.bodyText: Just noticed that while we are at it we can also add Locale#getLanguage(), do you mind adding it as well?
timeline.author: vkryachko
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -136,6 +146,8 @@ public EventInternal decorate(EventInternal eventInternal) {
         .addMetadata(KEY_TIMEZONE_OFFSET, getTzOffset())
         .addMetadata(KEY_NETWORK_TYPE, getNetTypeValue(networkInfo))
         .addMetadata(KEY_MOBILE_SUBTYPE, getNetSubtypeValue(networkInfo))
+        .addMetadata(KEY_COUNTRY, Locale.getDefault().getCountry())
